description: Cook an Aussie classic with this slow cooker apricot chicken recipe. It's tangy, succulent and a family favourite you'll make again and again.
name: Slow Cooker Apricot Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 40 g sachet French onion soup mix

recipeInstructions.text: Place couscous and 1 cup boiling water in a heatproof bowl, stirring to combine. Cover and stand for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork to separate grains, then stir in parsley and season. Divide couscous among plates. Top with apricot chicken and broccolini, scatter over almonds, then serve.
